game.bank

Class Bank

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.bank.Bank

  • public class Bank
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a game bank managing all Resources and DevelopmentCards not owned by Players.
    Author:
    Christoph Hermann
    See Also:
    Resources, DevelopmentCard, Player

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Bank()
      Creates a new Bank containing all Resources and DevelopmentCards not owned by Players.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addResources(Resources resourcesToAdd)
      Adds the specified Resources to this bank.
      DevelopmentCard drawDevelopmentCard()
      Draws the first card from the deck of DevelopmentCards within this bank.
      javafx.collections.ObservableList<DevelopmentCard> getDevelopmentCards()
      Returns the developmentCards.
      int getResourceAmount(ResourceType type)
      Returns the amount of Resources of the specified type which are still in this bank.
      Resources getResources()
      Get the Resources of this Bank.
      boolean hasResources(Resources comparedResources)
      checks if the requested amount of resources is still in the bank
      void removeResources(Resources resourcesToRemove)
      Removes the specified Resources from this bank.

    • Method Detail

      • removeResources

        public void removeResources(Resources resourcesToRemove)
        Removes the specified Resources from this bank.
        Parameters:
        resourcesToRemove - the Resources.

      • addResources

        public void addResources(Resources resourcesToAdd)
        Adds the specified Resources to this bank.
        Parameters:
        resourcesToAdd - the Resources.

      • drawDevelopmentCard

        public DevelopmentCard drawDevelopmentCard()
        Draws the first card from the deck of DevelopmentCards within this bank.
        Returns:
        the top card of the deck of DevelopmentCards.

      • getResourceAmount

        public int getResourceAmount(ResourceType type)
        Returns the amount of Resources of the specified type which are still in this bank.
        Parameters:
        type - the ResourceType.
        Returns:
        the amount of Resources.

      • getResources

        Get the Resources of this Bank.

      • hasResources

        public boolean hasResources(Resources comparedResources)
        checks if the requested amount of resources is still in the bank
        Parameters:
        comparedResources - resources to compare
        Returns:
        true or false
